I wanted an alternative to a tight sports bra for sleeping and these are perfect. They are soft and extremely stretchy. I opened the package and they looked...smaller than I expected. I tried one on and it was the perfect fit. I am approximately 145 lbs, 5'4", and a 36DDD. I ordered a large and it fits well without being too tight. It's good for sleeping and under other tops or sweaters, but with the large, isn't too supportive. If I wanted to wear it as a bra, I'd size down for a little more compression.  I've worn and washed them a handful of times and they have held color and shape, without any pilling. I plan to order another set, likely in a medium for a tighter fit. 评论概述: Just the right amount of support
评论详情: I used these to wear under my uniform for work. They are super comfortable and give light support to your girls just enough to not look braless. They are perfect for sleeping in or lounging about or just wearing as a comfortable bra.

Okay, full transparency as a D cup girl who is trying to look for cute tops. While I usually don’t like the U-neck line on my tops, it is really flattering and cute. I ordered the small and DONT have a problem with it being tight because of the stretchy material. As a girl with naturally low hanging boobs, I’ve never been able to wear just a top and no bra before. With this too I can and I see what I’ve been missing out on, I just readjust them and they’re ready to go about my day. Especially since the material is thick enough that nothing shows through. One thing I can tell will be a pain though is the material. While soft I’m sure lint will stick to it causing small fuzzies to build up so make sure to clean it really well.

They might work better for those with smaller sizes, but unfortunately, they didn’t meet my needs.
